Sentencas: Extensive efforts to develop a solid-oxide fuel cell for transportation, the bottoming cycle of a power plant, and distributed generation of electric energy are motivated by a need for greater fuel efficiency and reduced air pollution.
Titulo: Double perovskites as anode materials for solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Barriers to the introduction of hydrogen as the fuel have stimulated interest in developing an anode material that can be used with natural gas under operating temperatures 650 degrees C < T < 1000 degrees
Titulo: Double perovskites as anode materials for solid-oxide fuel cells
Double perovskites as anode materials for solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Here we report identification of the double perovskites Sr(2)Mg(1-x)Mn(x)MoO(6-delta) that meet the requirements for long-term stability with tolerance to sulfur and show a superior single-cell performance in hydrogen and methane.
Titulo: Double perovskites as anode materials for solid-oxide fuel cells
